home.benefit1Desc: Create one account, use on dozens of sites

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Manage your account security
security.connectedAppsDesc: Apps with access to your account
security.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
security.oauthNoPassword: Cannot change password for social login users
security.tip1: Use a strong, unique password that you don't use elsewhere
security.tip2: Enable two-factor authentication for extra security
security.tip3: Regularly review your active sessions and connected apps
security.tip4: Never share your password or recovery codes with anyone
security.scanQRCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
security.enterCodeFromApp: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
security.saveRecoveryCodes: Save these codes in a safe place
security.recoveryCodesWarning: Each code can only be used once. Store them securely - you will need them if you lose access to your authenticator app.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.subtitle: Manage your active sessions across devices
sessions.revokeAllWarning: This will sign you out of all devices except this one. You will need to sign in again on those devices.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security
twoFactor.setupSubtitle: Enable two-factor authentication for your account
twoFactor.step1Desc: Download Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP compatible app
twoFactor.step2Desc: Scan the QR code in your authenticator app
twoFactor.step3Desc: Enter the 6-digit code from the app to complete setup
twoFactor.disableWarning: Disabling 2FA will reduce your account security. Are you sure you want to continue?
twoFactor.recoveryCodesDesc: Store these codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app.
twoFactor.regenerateWarning: Regenerating recovery codes will invalidate your old codes. Are you sure you want to continue?
twoFactor.enabledDesc: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication

account.title: Account Settings
account.subtitle: Manage your account details and linked accounts
account.linkedAccountsDesc: Connect or disconnect your social accounts
account.cannotUnlink: Cannot unlink this account as it is your only login method
account.dataExportDesc: Download a copy of all your personal data (GDPR compliant)
account.accountDeletionDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
account.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. Your account will be scheduled for deletion in 30 days.
account.exportDescription: Download a copy of all your data including profile, transactions, and connected apps.
account.deleteDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone after the grace period.
account.deleteGracePeriod: You will have 30 days to cancel this request. After that, your data will be permanently deleted.
account.deleteReasonPlaceholder: Tell us why you want to delete your account...

common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?

connectedApps.noAppsDesc: When you authorize apps to access your account, they will appear here.
connectedApps.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke access for {app}?

loginHistory.description: History of logins to your account
loginHistory.noHistoryDesc: When you log in to your account, it will appear here.
loginHistory.securityNotice: If you see any unfamiliar logins, change your password immediately and contact us.

docs.title: Developer Documentation
docs.subtitle: Integrate Kimlik.az APIs into your application

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Add "Login with Wallet" using OAuth, then start accepting payments.

oauth.title: OAuth & Authentication
oauth.description: Add "Login with Wallet" button to your app. Users log in with one click.

payments.title: Payments API
payments.description: Request payments from user accounts. Top-up balance, service fees, etc.

support.title: Need help?
support.description: Our developer support team is ready to help

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The Payments API allows you to request payments from a user's Kimlik.az balance. After the user approves, the amount is transferred from their balance to your partner balance.
overview.scopeRequired: This API requires the wallet:charge scope. Request this scope during OAuth.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Create a payment request via API (amount, description)
howItWorks.step2Desc: User approves the payment in Kimlik.az popup
howItWorks.step3Desc: You receive a webhook when payment is completed
howItWorks.step4Desc: Amount moves from user to your partner balance

approvalFlow.title: Approval Flow
approvalFlow.description: After creating a charge, redirect the user to the Kimlik.az approval page. When the user approves or rejects, a message is sent to the popup window.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: When payment status changes, a webhook is sent to your backend. Set the webhook URL in your app settings.
webhooks.signatureNote: Verify webhook signature using the X-Wallet-Signature header
webhooks.completedDesc: Payment completed successfully. Add to user balance.

autoApprove.title: Auto-Approve
autoApprove.description: Users can set auto-approve limits for small amounts. For example, if a user sets a 5 AZN limit for your app, payments under 5 AZN will be auto-approved.
autoApprove.howItWorks: In this case, the charge response will have status 'approved' directly without an approval_url.
autoApprove.example: Example: User sets 10 AZN limit for Alert.az. A 7 AZN charge will be auto-approved.

support.title: Need help?
support.description: Our developer support team is ready to help

oauthDocs.title: OAuth API Documentation
oauthDocs.subtitle: Integrate "Login with Wallet" into your application

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Kimlik.az OAuth 2.0 allows partner applications to authenticate users through their Kimlik.az account. Users verify their identity once on Kimlik.az and can then use this verification across all partner sites. This eliminates the need for separate registration on each partner site.
overview.benefit1Desc: Users log in once, access everywhere

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: To integrate Kimlik.az OAuth into your application, follow these steps:
gettingStarted.step1: Contact us to register your application and receive a client_id
gettingStarted.step1New: Create your OAuth application in the Developer Dashboard
gettingStarted.step2: Configure your redirect URIs (must be HTTPS in production)
gettingStarted.step3: Choose the scopes your application needs
gettingStarted.step4: Implement the OAuth flow in your application
gettingStarted.contactNote: To register your application, contact us at developer@kimlik.az
gettingStarted.createAppNote: Ready to start? Create your first OAuth application now!

flow.title: Authorization Flow
flow.description: Kimlik.az uses the OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code flow with PKCE for secure authentication.
flow.step1Desc: Create a code_verifier and code_challenge using SHA-256
flow.step2Desc: Redirect user to Kimlik.az consent screen with your client_id, scopes, and PKCE challenge
flow.step3Desc: User reviews requested permissions and clicks Allow. Kimlik.az redirects back with an authorization code
flow.step4Desc: Your backend exchanges the authorization code + code_verifier for access and refresh tokens

pkce.title: PKCE (Proof Key for Code Exchange)
pkce.description: PKCE adds an extra layer of security to the OAuth flow by preventing authorization code interception attacks. It's required for all Kimlik.az OAuth integrations.
pkce.required: PKCE is required for all OAuth requests. Requests without valid code_challenge will be rejected.
pkce.step1: Generate a random code_verifier (43-128 characters, URL-safe)
pkce.step4: Send original code_verifier with token exchange request

endpoints.title: API Endpoints
endpoints.authorizeDesc: Opens the consent screen where users can grant or deny access to your application.
endpoints.tokenDesc: Exchange an authorization code for access and refresh tokens.
endpoints.userDesc: Retrieve user information based on the granted scopes.
endpoints.redirectUriDesc: URL to redirect after authorization (must match registered URI)
endpoints.stateDesc: Random string to prevent CSRF attacks
endpoints.userNote: Fields returned depend on granted scopes. Only requested and approved scopes will return data.

errorCodes.title: Error Codes
errorCodes.invalidClient: The client_id is invalid or not registered
errorCodes.invalidRedirectUri: The redirect_uri doesn't match any registered URI
errorCodes.invalidScope: One or more requested scopes are invalid
errorCodes.invalidCode: The authorization code is invalid or already used
errorCodes.invalidCodeVerifier: The code_verifier doesn't match the code_challenge
errorCodes.codeExpired: The authorization code has expired (5 minute limit)
errorCodes.accessDenied: The user denied the authorization request
errorCodes.insufficientScope: The token doesn't have the required scope for this request

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you have questions about integrating Kimlik.az OAuth, our developer support team is here to help.

docs.title: Integration Guide
docs.description: Learn how to integrate "Login with Wallet" into your application with code examples.

apps.title: My Applications
apps.noAppsDesc: Create your first OAuth application to integrate with Kimlik.az
apps.regenerateWarning: This will invalidate the current secret. All apps using the old secret will stop working. Are you sure?
apps.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {app}? This will revoke access for all connected users.
apps.secretWarning: Copy this secret now. You won't be able to see it again!
apps.regenerateWebhookWarning: This will invalidate the current webhook secret. Are you sure?
apps.webhookSecretWarning: Copy this secret now. You won't be able to see it again! This secret will be used to verify webhook requests.

form.name: Application Name
form.scopesNote: Choose which data your app can access
form.webhookUrlHint: Endpoint URL where payment notifications will be sent

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Kimlik.az, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and websiteca.com.

age.title: Age Requirements
age.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use this service. If you are located in the European Union, you must be at least 16 years old. By creating an account, you represent and warrant that you meet these age requirements. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under these ages, we will delete that information promptly.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Kimlik.az provides identity verification and single sign-on services. We allow you to create one account and use it across multiple partner websites and applications. Our services include:

items.identity: Identity verification: Phone and email verification
items.sso: Single sign-on: Use one account across partner sites
items.oauth: OAuth authentication: Secure login for partner applications
items.wallet: Wallet services: Digital wallet functionality (where available)

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to:

items.accurate: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
items.update: Keep your account information up to date
items.security: Maintain the security of your password and accept responsibility for all activities under your account
items.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
items.noShare: Not share your account credentials with others

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of Kimlik.az, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, software, and the compilation thereof, are the exclusive property of websiteca.com and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

items.copy: Copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission
items.trademark: Use our trademarks, logos, or branding without written authorization
items.reverse: Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble our software
items.scrape: Use automated systems to extract data from our services

partnerResponsibilities.title: Partner Sites and Third-Party Services
partnerResponsibilities.content: When you use your Kimlik.az account to access partner sites:

items.separate: Your relationship with partner sites is governed by their own terms and privacy policies
items.liability: We are not responsible for the actions, content, or data practices of partner sites
items.compliance: Partner sites using Kimlik.az OAuth must comply with our Partner Terms and applicable data protection laws
items.misuse: If a partner site misuses your data in violation of their agreement with us, we may terminate their access to our services

partnerResponsibilities.report: If you believe a partner site has misused your data, please contact us at abuse@kimlik.az

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: You may not use our services to:

items.illegal: Engage in any illegal activities or violate any applicable laws
items.impersonate: Impersonate others or misrepresent your identity or affiliations
items.malware: Distribute malware, viruses, or other harmful software
items.unauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of our services
items.spam: Send spam, phishing attempts, or other unsolicited communications
items.fraud: Engage in fraudulent activities or financial crimes
items.abuse: Abuse, harass, or harm other users

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account and access to our services:

items.violation: Violation of these Terms of Service
items.request: Your request to delete your account
items.inactivity: Extended period of account inactivity (over 2 years)

termination.effect: Upon termination, your right to use our services will cease immediately. We may retain certain data as required by law or for legitimate business purposes.
termination.appeal: If you believe your account was terminated in error, you may contact us at appeals@kimlik.az

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW:

items.asis: Kimlik.az is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied
items.nowarranty: We do not warrant that our services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure
items.nodamages: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services
items.cap: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the 12 months preceding the claim

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless websiteca.com, its officers, directors, employees, agents, and affiliates from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable legal fees, arising out of or in any way connected with:

items.access: Your access to or use of our services
items.violation: Your violation of these Terms of Service
items.rights: Your violation of any third-party rights, including intellectual property rights
items.content: Any content you submit or transmit through our services

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of our services shall be resolved through:

items.informal: Informal negotiation: We encourage you to contact us first to resolve issues
items.arbitration: Binding arbitration: If informal resolution fails, disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration in Los Angeles, California
items.courts: Court jurisdiction: You may also bring claims in the courts of Los Angeles County, California

governingLaw.classAction: You agree to resolve disputes on an individual basis and waive the right to participate in class action lawsuits.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes by:

items.email: Sending an email to your registered email address
items.notice: Posting a notice on our website
items.login: Displaying a notification when you log in

changes.continued: Continued use of our services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. If you do not agree to the changes, you must stop using our services.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms of Service is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.name: websiteca.com
companyInfo.address: 5670 WILSHIRE BLVD, STE 1838, LOS ANGELES, CA 90036-5679, USA

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.description: How to delete your data from Kimlik.az
dataDeletion.intro: If you want to delete your Kimlik.az account and all associated data, you can do so by following these steps:
dataDeletion.step1: Log in to your Kimlik.az account
dataDeletion.step4: Confirm the deletion by entering your password
dataDeletion.alternative: Alternatively, you can request account deletion by contacting us:
dataDeletion.timeframe: Your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days of your request. Some data may be retained for legal compliance purposes.

socialLoginRevocation.title: Revoking Social Login Access
socialLoginRevocation.description: If you signed up using a social login (Facebook or Google), we recommend also revoking access from those platforms:

facebook.title: Disconnect from Facebook
facebook.description: To revoke Kimlik.az access from your Facebook account:
facebook.step1: Open Facebook and go to Settings & Privacy → Settings
facebook.step2: Click on "Apps and Websites" in the left menu
facebook.step3: Find "Kimlik.az" in the list of connected apps
facebook.step4: Click "Remove" to disconnect Kimlik.az from your Facebook account

google.title: Disconnect from Google
google.description: To revoke Kimlik.az access from your Google account:
google.step2: Navigate to Security → Third-party apps with account access
google.step4: Click "Remove Access" to disconnect Kimlik.az from your Google account

dataRetention.title: Data Retention After Deletion
dataRetention.description: When you delete your account, most of your data is immediately removed. However, some data may be retained:

items.transactions: Transaction records: Retained for 7 years for legal and accounting purposes
items.logs: Security logs: Retained for 2 years for fraud prevention
items.legal: Legal compliance data: Retained as required by applicable laws
items.anonymized: Anonymized analytics data: May be retained indefinitely for service improvement

dataRetention.partners: Please note that partner sites you logged into using Kimlik.az may have their own copies of data you shared with them. You should contact those sites directly to request deletion of your data from their systems.

dataDeletion.confirmationEmail: After initiating account deletion, you will receive a confirmation email. Your account will remain accessible for 14 days in case you change your mind. After this grace period, all eligible data will be permanently deleted within 30 days.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Kimlik.az ("we," "our," or "us") is operated by websiteca.com. We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our identity verification and single sign-on services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us when creating an account or using our services:

items.personal: Personal identification information: name, email address, phone number
items.profile: Profile information: profile photo, display name, timezone preferences
items.verification: Verification data: phone verification status, email verification status
items.payment: Payment and wallet information: transaction history, balance information
items.usage: Usage data: login history, connected applications, device information

socialLogin.title: Social Login (Facebook & Google)
socialLogin.content: When you choose to register or sign in using Facebook or Google, we collect specific data from these platforms:

facebook.title: Facebook Login
facebook.content: We collect data via Facebook Login including: your name, email address, and profile picture as permitted by your Facebook privacy settings. We do not post to your Facebook timeline or access your friends list.
facebook.revoke: You can revoke Facebook access at any time through Facebook Settings → Apps and Websites → Remove Kimlik.az

google.title: Google Login
google.content: When using Google Sign-In, we receive your name, email address, and profile picture. We do not access your Google Drive, Gmail, or any other Google services.
google.revoke: You can revoke Google access at any time through your Google Account → Security → Third-party apps with account access → Remove Kimlik.az

thirdPartyPartners.title: Third-Party Partner Sites
thirdPartyPartners.content: When you use your Kimlik.az account to log in to partner sites through our OAuth system:

dataShared.title: Data Shared with Partners
dataShared.content: Partner sites receive only the data you explicitly authorize during the consent process. This may include:

partnerObligations.title: Partner Obligations
partnerObligations.content: Partner sites are contractually bound to protect your data and comply with applicable privacy laws. Partners must not share your data with third parties without your consent and must delete your data upon request.

revokeAccess.title: Revoking Partner Access
revokeAccess.content: You can revoke any partner site's access to your data at any time through Settings → Connected Apps in your Kimlik.az account.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to operate our services:

types.essential: Essential cookies: Required for the service to function (session management, authentication)
types.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how you use our service to improve it
types.preferences: Preference cookies: Remember your settings and preferences

cookies.manage: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may prevent you from using our services.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

items.provide: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.process: To process transactions and send related information
items.verify: To verify your identity and prevent fraud
items.communicate: To send you technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support messages
items.respond: To respond to your comments, questions, and customer service requests
items.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve user experience
items.legal: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share your information only in the following circumstances:

items.consent: With your consent: When you authorize partner sites through OAuth
items.legal: For legal reasons: When required by law, court order, or government request
items.protection: For protection: To protect the rights, property, or safety of Kimlik.az, our users, or others
items.business: Business transfers: In connection with any merger, sale, or acquisition

sharing.noSale: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. Specific retention periods:

periods.account: Account data: Retained until account deletion is requested
periods.transactions: Transaction history: 7 years for legal and accounting purposes
periods.analytics: Analytics data: 26 months in anonymized form

retention.partners: Partner sites may have their own data retention policies. Please review their privacy policies for details.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR and Applicable Laws)
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Right to Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
items.rectification: Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
items.erasure: Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten")
items.portability: Right to Data Portability: Request your data in a machine-readable format
items.restriction: Right to Restriction: Request limitation of processing in certain circumstances
items.objection: Right to Object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
items.withdraw: Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time where we rely on consent

rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@kimlik.az or through Settings → Privacy in your account.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

items.consent: Consent: When you create an account, enable social login, or authorize partner access
items.contract: Contract: To fulfill our contractual obligations to provide services
items.legitimate: Legitimate Interest: For fraud prevention, security, and service improvement
items.legal: Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data is primarily stored and processed in Azerbaijan. When we transfer data internationally, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including standard contractual clauses approved by relevant data protection authorities.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age (or 16 in the European Union). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under these ages. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately at privacy@kimlik.az, and we will promptly delete such information.

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data:

items.encryption: Encryption: All data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256)
items.access: Access Controls: Strict access controls and authentication for our systems
items.monitoring: Monitoring: 24/7 security monitoring and intrusion detection
items.audits: Audits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
items.training: Training: Staff training on data protection and security practices

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by:

items.email: Sending an email to your registered email address
items.notice: Posting a prominent notice on our website
items.app: Displaying a notification when you log in to your account

changes.effective: Changes will be effective immediately upon posting, unless otherwise stated. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your data protection rights, please contact us:

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.name: websiteca.com
companyInfo.address: 5670 WILSHIRE BLVD, STE 1838, LOS ANGELES, CA 90036-5679, USA
companyInfo.dataProtection: For data protection inquiries, you may also contact our Data Protection Officer at dpo@kimlik.az
